plot: A standoff ensues between the DEO and Astra's forces also Non kidnaps Hank, while Kara tries to refute Cat's allegations that she's Supergirl.

The confrontation between the DEO and Astra's forces at Lord Enterprises ends with Hank being taken. General Lane shows to take control of the DEO in Hank's absence. Kara tries to talk to Astra but she's unwilling to open up. Cat suspects Kara is Supergirl. Jimmy decides to investigate Lord and asks Winn to help. And when it doesn't turn out well, and when Kara learns of this she wants to go after Lord but Jimmy and Winn tell her to cool off. She then goes to Astra and hears her side of what happened between her and her mother. Kara then makes a decision.—rcs0411@yahoo.com
